title: DuckDB-WASM Integration
description: Add DuckDB-WASM to The Lab (CDN load, ~4MB engine). Load all 15 Parquet files from GitHub Pages (~15MB total) and register as named tables. Execute all 52 CREATE VIEW statements on initialization. Implement connection health check, loading progress indicators, and graceful error handling for browsers that do not support WebAssembly. Depends on TKT-A for Parquet files and view DDL.
